com.rapidminer.operator.modelling

Class MLNAbstractFileReaderOperator

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.rapidminer.tools.AbstractObservable<com.rapidminer.operator.Operator>
      • com.rapidminer.operator.Operator
        • com.rapidminer.operator.modelling.MLNOperator
          • com.rapidminer.operator.modelling.MLNAbstractFileReaderOperator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.rapidminer.gui.wizards.ConfigurationListener, com.rapidminer.gui.wizards.PreviewListener, com.rapidminer.operator.annotation.ResourceConsumer, com.rapidminer.parameter.ParameterHandler, com.rapidminer.tools.LoggingHandler, com.rapidminer.tools.Observable<com.rapidminer.operator.Operator>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    MLNEvidenceFileReaderOperator, MLNInferenceResultFileReaderOperator, MLNQueryFileReaderOperator, MLNRuleFileReaderOperator

    public abstract class MLNAbstractFileReaderOperator
extends MLNOperator
    Specifies the overall structure of a MLN file reader operator and provides general functionality.
    Author:
    Yann Kiraly

    • Constructor Detail

      • MLNAbstractFileReaderOperator

        public MLNAbstractFileReaderOperator(com.rapidminer.operator.OperatorDescription description)
                              throws com.rapidminer.operator.OperatorException
        Creates an MLNAbstractFileReaderOperator instance and initializes its output ports.

        Provides the required constructor passing on an OperatorDescription to the Operator constructor. Initializes the operator's output ports by creating one for every ExampleSetType required for the role specified by the implementing subclass. A generation rule is added for each port specifying that an ExampleSet is produced.

        Parameters:
        description: - OperatorDescription RapidMiner requires to be accepted by all operator classes.
        Throws:
        com.rapidminer.operator.OperatorException

    • Method Detail

      • getParameterTypes

        public java.util.List<com.rapidminer.parameter.ParameterType> getParameterTypes()
        Creates the file reader parameters.

        This method creates two parameters for file readers. The first one indicates the type of the file to be imported based on the file types specified in MLNFileTypeSpecification.xml. The second one contains the path of the MLN file.

        Specified by:
        getParameterTypes in interface com.rapidminer.parameter.ParameterHandler
        Overrides:
        getParameterTypes in class com.rapidminer.operator.Operator
        Returns:
        List: The parameters of the operator.
